original: @182a * // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mchod pa mdor bsdus pa bzhugs /
analyzed: @182a * // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mchod pa mdor bsdus pa bzhugs /
translated: Brief Worship of Vajrayoginī

original: // / @182b # //  rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bla ma rje btsun mnga' bdag gi khrod pa'i //
analyzed: // / @182b # //  rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo // bla ma rje btsun mnga' bdag gi khrod pa'i //
translated: Homage to Vajrayoginī.

original: zhabs kyi rdul la bdag gis phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: zhabs kyi rdul la bdag gis phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage at the feet of the dust🔽of the lord guru Jetsun Drokpa.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni mchod pa'i thabs //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni mchod pa'i thabs //
translated: The method of worship of Vajrayoginī

original: bla ma'i bka' ni ji bzhin dran nas bris //
analyzed: bla ma'i bka' ni ji bzhin dran nas bris //
translated: is written, remembering the guru's words.

original: rnal 'byor pa yis dang por ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis dang por ni //
translated: First, the yogī

original: gru bzhi la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
analyzed: gru bzhi la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
translated: should make a maṇḍala with four sides, and so on.

original: me tog lha yi grangs bzhin dgod //
analyzed: me tog lha yi grangs bzhin dgod //
translated: Arrange flowers according to the number of deities.

original: mchod sogs gtor ma ji bzhin bya //
analyzed: mchod sogs gtor ma ji bzhin bya //
translated: Make offerings, and so on, as before.

original: bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi ni //
translated: For the deity of one's desire,

original: skad cig nga rgyal gnas pa la //
analyzed: skad cig nga rgyal gnas pa la //
translated: one should abide in the pride of being that deity.

original: lag pa g-yon pas reg byas pas //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas reg byas pas //
translated: By touching with the left hand,🔽one should do the armor of the six heroes

original: dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang // dpa' mo'i go cha de bzhin byas //
analyzed: dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang // dpa' mo'i go cha de bzhin byas //
translated: and the armor of the heroines.

original: aom ha ni snying gar ro //
analyzed: aom ha ni snying gar ro //
translated: Oṃ haṃ is at the heart.

original: na ma: hi ni mgo la'o //
analyzed: na ma: hi ni mgo la'o //
translated: Na mo haṃ is on the head.

original: sv'a h'a hu ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a hu ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
translated: Svāhā huṃ is on the crown of the head.

original: boo shat he ni phrag pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: boo shat he ni phrag pa gnyis la'o //
translated: BHO and SHI are on the two shoulders.

original: h'um h'um ho ni mig dag la'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um ho ni mig dag la'o //
translated: HUM HUM HO are on the two eyes.

original: mtshon char phat ham ni yan lag thams cad la'o //🔽aom bam ni lte bar ro //
analyzed: mtshon char phat ham ni yan lag thams cad la'o // aom bam ni lte bar ro //
translated: The weapon PHAṬ and HAM are on all the limbs.🔽 OM and BAM are at the navel.

original: ham yom ni snying gar ro //🔽hrim mom ni kha la'o //🔽hrem hrim ni mgo la'o //
analyzed: ham yom ni snying gar ro // hrim mom ni kha la'o // hrem hrim ni mgo la'o //
translated: YOM and HAM are at the heart.🔽 HRIM and MOM are at the mouth.🔽 HREM HREM are on the head.

original: h'um h'um ni spyi gtsug gu'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um ni spyi gtsug gu'o //
translated: HUM HUM are on the crown of the head.

original: mtshon cha phat phat yan lag thams cad la'o //🔽de ltar na go cha gnyis bgos nas dang por spyang bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshon cha phat phat yan lag thams cad la'o // de ltar na go cha gnyis bgos nas dang por spyang bar bya ba ni /
translated: The weapon PHAṬ PHAṬ are on all the limbs.

original: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
analyzed: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
translated: In that way, having donned the two armors, first one should purify with YAM from wind and RAM from fire.🔽On that is A with three heads,

original: de steng aa la mgo gsum dang // de yi steng du ka p'a la //
analyzed: de steng aa la mgo gsum dang // de yi steng du ka p'a la //
translated: and above that is the kapāla.

original: bh'u / a'am /
analyzed: bh'u / a'am /
translated: BHUH, AUM,🔽 JRIH, KHAM,

original: dzr'im / kham /🔽h'um / de dag yongs su gyur pa las //
analyzed: dzr'im / kham / h'um / de dag yongs su gyur pa las //
translated: HUM.

original: bshad ba la sogs bdud rtsi lnga //
analyzed: bshad ba la sogs bdud rtsi lnga //
translated: Those completely transform into the five elixirs, such as the explanation, and so on.

original: de steng yi ge lnga nyid las //
analyzed: de steng yi ge lnga nyid las //
translated: Above that, from the five seed syllables,

original: go ku da ha na la sogs rnam lngar gyur //🔽aom gyis ye shes sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: go ku da ha na la sogs rnam lngar gyur // aom gyis ye shes sbyang bar bya //
translated: they become the five, such as go, ku, da, ha, and na.🔽 OM purifies the gnosis.

original: a'a: yis ye shes rtogs par bya //
analyzed: a'a: yis ye shes rtogs par bya //
translated: A purifies the gnosis.🔽

original: h'um gis ye shes rab tu 'bar //
analyzed: h'um gis ye shes rab tu 'bar //
translated: Hum causes the wisdom to blaze.

original: ham gis ye shes bdud rtsir gyur //🔽g-yon pa'i lag pas spyang par bya //
analyzed: ham gis ye shes bdud rtsir gyur // g-yon pa'i lag pas spyang par bya //
translated: Ham causes the wisdom to become nectar.🔽One should lick with the left hand.

original: g-yas pa'i lag pas rtog par bya //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i lag pas rtog par bya //
translated: One should imagine with the right hand.

original: thal mo bkab pas 'bar bar byed //
analyzed: thal mo bkab pas 'bar bar byed //
translated: One should cause to blaze by covering with the palms.

original: bya khyung phyag rgyas bdud rtsir bsgyur //
analyzed: bya khyung phyag rgyas bdud rtsir bsgyur //
translated: One should transform into nectar with the garuḍa mudra.

original: zla ba bzhi ba'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: zla ba bzhi ba'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature is the fourth month.

original: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med kyis //
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med kyis //
translated: Then, with the left ring finger,

original: chang gi thugs pa blangs nas su //
analyzed: chang gi thugs pa blangs nas su //
translated: one should take up a cup of beer

original: sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya //
analyzed: sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya //
translated: and make a triangular source of phenomena on the ground.

original: de yi dbus su zlum po ni //
analyzed: de yi dbus su zlum po ni //
translated: In the middle of that, one should make

original: thig le yi ni gzugs su bya //
analyzed: thig le yi ni gzugs su bya //
translated: a round drop in the form of a bindu.

original: dkyil 'khor lo bsam par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lo bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the mandala.

original: de nas thig le mchod par bya //
analyzed: de nas thig le mchod par bya //
translated: Then one should make offerings to the bindu.

original: rang gi mgrin par myang bar bya //
analyzed: rang gi mgrin par myang bar bya //
translated: One should taste it at one's throat.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Om ah hum.

original: thabs dang shes rab tshim par byed pa ste thun mong pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab tshim par byed pa ste thun mong pa'o //
translated: This is the common satisfaction of method and wisdom.

original: g-yon pa yi ni lag mthil la //
analyzed: g-yon pa yi ni lag mthil la //
translated: On the palm of the left hand,

original: padma dmar po 'dab lda bsgom//
analyzed: padma dmar po 'dab lda bsgom//
translated: one should visualize a red lotus with petals.

original: @183a * // dbus su aom bam rdo rje phag / gshin rje yum brtsams 'dab ma la //
analyzed: @183a * // dbus su aom bam rdo rje phag / gshin rje yum brtsams 'dab ma la //
translated: In the center, Oṃ vaṃ is Vajravārāhī.

original: ham aom dang ni ya mi ni //🔽hrim mom dag ni rmongs byed ma //
analyzed: ham aom dang ni ya mi ni // hrim mom dag ni rmongs byed ma //
translated: On the petals, Haṃ, Oṃ, and Yamini.🔽Hriṃ, Moṃ are Moharā.

original: hrem grim dag ni skyod byed ma'o //
analyzed: hrem grim dag ni skyod byed ma'o //
translated: Hreṃ, Hriṃ are Cakravarmiṇī.

original: h'um h'um skrag byed ma ru shes //
analyzed: h'um h'um skrag byed ma ru shes //
translated: Hūṃ, Hūṃ is known as Bhayānakā.

original: phat phat dag ni tsandi kas //
analyzed: phat phat dag ni tsandi kas //
translated: Phaṭ, Phaṭ are Caṇḍikā.

original: rgan po la ni rdo rje sems //
analyzed: rgan po la ni rdo rje sems //
translated: On the old man is Vajrasattva.

original: mdzub mo la ni rnam snang mdzad //
analyzed: mdzub mo la ni rnam snang mdzad //
translated: On the index finger is Vairocana.

original: padma gar dbang gung mo la //
analyzed: padma gar dbang gung mo la //
translated: On the middle finger is Padmanarteśvara.

original: he ru ka dpal ming med la //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal ming med la //
translated: On the ring finger is Śrī Heruka.

original: rdo rje nyi ma mthe chung la //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma mthe chung la //
translated: On the little finger is Vajrasūrya.

original: rta mchog rdo rje sen phreng la'o //
analyzed: rta mchog rdo rje sen phreng la'o //
translated: On the horse’s head is Vajra Hayagrīva.

original: de ltar yid kyis bsgoms pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar yid kyis bsgoms pa ni //
translated: Thus, one should meditate mentally

original: sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs nyid dam //
analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs nyid dam //
translated: on the form of the mantra syllables,

original: yang na kha dog dbyibs kyi gzugs //
analyzed: yang na kha dog dbyibs kyi gzugs //
translated: or else on the form of color and shape.

original: rang gi ming brjod me tog bcas //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod me tog bcas //
translated: Reciting their names, one should scatter flowers.

original: de dag gis ni dgod par bya //
analyzed: de dag gis ni dgod par bya //
translated: One should laugh with them.

original: de la me tog spos kyis mchod //
analyzed: de la me tog spos kyis mchod //
translated: One should worship them with flowers and incense.

original: chang gis kyang ni tshim par bya //
analyzed: chang gis kyang ni tshim par bya //
translated: One should also satisfy them with beer.

original: de nas mandala steng du blugs //
analyzed: de nas mandala steng du blugs //
translated: Then one should pour it on the maṇḍala.

original: slar yang rang gi mgo la gzhag / phyi nas 'khor lo sdom pa mchod //
analyzed: slar yang rang gi mgo la gzhag / phyi nas 'khor lo sdom pa mchod //
translated: Then make offerings to Cakrasaṃvara.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'am //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'am //
translated: The maṇḍala wheel is complete,

original: yang na bcu gsum bdag nyid sogs //
analyzed: yang na bcu gsum bdag nyid sogs //
translated: or else it has thirteen parts, and so on.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
translated: From the seed syllable in one’s heart center,

original: dam tshig 'khor lo spro bar bya //
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lo spro bar bya //
translated: the pledge wheel is emanated.🔽The gnosis wheel is caused to enter that.

original: ye shes 'khor lo de la gzhug / me tog la sogs re re yang //🔽snying po'i sngags sam nye snying gis //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo de la gzhug / me tog la sogs re re yang // snying po'i sngags sam nye snying gis //
translated: Each of the offerings, such as flowers,🔽is offered to Vajravārāhī

original: rdo rje phag mo mchod par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo mchod par bya //
translated: with the essence mantra or the quintessence mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams //
translated: The goddesses such as dakini

original: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
translated: are offered with their individual mantras.

original: aom ni thog mar hum h'um mthar //
analyzed: aom ni thog mar hum h'um mthar //
translated: At the beginning, oṃ; at the end, hūṃ hūṃ.

original: sbyor ba yis ni mchod par bya //🔽phyogs rnam dag ni g-yon skor te //
analyzed: sbyor ba yis ni mchod par bya // phyogs rnam dag ni g-yon skor te //
translated: They are offered with this application.🔽The directions are purified in a counterclockwise circle,

original: mtshams rnams de bzhin g-yas skor du //
analyzed: mtshams rnams de bzhin g-yas skor du //
translated: and the intermediate directions in a clockwise circle.

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i bstod pas mchod //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i bstod pas mchod //
translated: Make offerings with the eight-line praise.🔽When the offerings are complete in that way,

original: de ltar mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // snod gzhan dag ni byin brlabs la //
analyzed: de ltar mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // snod gzhan dag ni byin brlabs la //
translated: bless another vessel,

original: snod gnyis gcig tu bsre bar bya //
analyzed: snod gnyis gcig tu bsre bar bya //
translated: and mix the two vessels into one.

original: c'a ru'i bza' ba de la bshad //
analyzed: c'a ru'i bza' ba de la bshad //
translated: This is explained in the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra.

original: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs la //
analyzed: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs la //
translated: Then consecrate the bali

original: dang po sngags kyis snyan gsan dbab //
analyzed: dang po sngags kyis snyan gsan dbab //
translated: and first invite with the mantra.

original: aa ralli sogs sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: aa ralli sogs sngags kyis ni //
translated: With the mantra of A ra lli and so forth,

original: gtor ma rjes su dbul bar bya //
analyzed: gtor ma rjes su dbul bar bya //
translated: offer the bali.

original: de nas rnal 'byor tshul bzhin bya //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor tshul bzhin bya //
translated: Then perform the yoga

original: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams la gnas //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams la gnas //
translated: and abide in the enjoyments of desire.

original: glu dang gar sogs thams cad bya //🔽badzra mandala mu: zhes pa'i //
analyzed: glu dang gar sogs thams cad bya // badzra mandala mu: zhes pa'i //
translated: Do all the singing, dancing, and so forth.🔽With the mantra “vajra maṇḍala muḥ,”

original: sngags kyi mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: sngags kyi mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
translated: request them to depart.

original: lhag ma dag ni sngon bzhin du //🔽gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
analyzed: lhag ma dag ni sngon bzhin du // gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
translated: The remainder is consecrated as before.

original: zos shing 'thungs pa'i lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: zos shing 'thungs pa'i lhag ma rnams //
translated: The remainder of what is eaten and drunk

original: sor mo ldas ni bdud rtsi'i rgyun //🔽'bab @183b par bsams nas yi dags kyi //
analyzed: sor mo ldas ni bdud rtsi'i rgyun // 'bab @183b par bsams nas yi dags kyi //
translated: is imagined to be a stream of elixir

original: tshogs rnams dag la spyin par bya //
analyzed: tshogs rnams dag la spyin par bya //
translated: that is given to the assembly of ghosts.

original: de dag ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang thun mong pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de dag ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang thun mong pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: That is the ritual common to the gaṇacakra.

original: tshes bcu la sogs dus dag tu //
analyzed: tshes bcu la sogs dus dag tu //
translated: On the tenth day of the lunar month and so forth,

original: gzhan yang bla ma'i man ngag dus //
analyzed: gzhan yang bla ma'i man ngag dus //
translated: and also at other times according to the guru’s instructions,

original: gong bzhin mandala byas pa la //
analyzed: gong bzhin mandala byas pa la //
translated: Having made a maṇḍala as before,

original: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma yi //🔽g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma yi // g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya //
translated: one should draw the mark of the yoginī,🔽the coiled auspicious sign.

original: mtshams su chang gi thig le bya //
analyzed: mtshams su chang gi thig le bya //
translated: One should place a drop of liquor in the corners.

original: de yi dbus su mchod bya ba //
analyzed: de yi dbus su mchod bya ba //
translated: In the middle of that, one should make an offering,

original: slar yang de bzhin dri med phyir //
analyzed: slar yang de bzhin dri med phyir //
translated: and again, in the same way, for the sake of purity,

original: snod du mdzes mas legs par btsags //
analyzed: snod du mdzes mas legs par btsags //
translated: the beautiful vessel is well-pressed.

original: chos 'byung kha sbyor tsa kra'i dbus //
analyzed: chos 'byung kha sbyor tsa kra'i dbus //
translated: In the center of the cakra of the joined source of phenomena,

original: gsang sngags ma smad pa zhes 'di //
analyzed: gsang sngags ma smad pa zhes 'di //
translated: this is called the praise of the mantra.

original: cho ga bzhin du dben par bri //🔽'khor lo'i mtshams su phag mo sogs //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du dben par bri // 'khor lo'i mtshams su phag mo sogs //
translated: One should draw it in a secluded place according to the rite.🔽In the corners of the cakra, the six signs of Vārāhī and so forth,

original: cho ga'i lha mo mtshan ma drug / g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma bri //
analyzed: cho ga'i lha mo mtshan ma drug / g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan ma bri //
translated: the signs of the goddesses of the rite, and the coiled auspicious sign are drawn.

original: me tog dri zhim phreng bas bskor //
analyzed: me tog dri zhim phreng bas bskor //
translated: It is surrounded by fragrant flower garlands.🔽With the four results, the four cubits, and the special offerings of fragrant flowers,

original: 'bras bu bzhi dang khru sna bzhi dag dang // khyad par can gyi mchod pa dri zhim me tog dang // mchod pa rnam pa du mas 'khor lo legs par mchod //
analyzed: 'bras bu bzhi dang khru sna bzhi dag dang // khyad par can gyi mchod pa dri zhim me tog dang // mchod pa rnam pa du mas 'khor lo legs par mchod //
translated: one should make offerings to the cakra with many kinds of offerings.

original: grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no //
analyzed: grong khyer 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no //
translated: This is the supreme destruction of the city.

original: 'di ltar lha mo'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pa la brtson pa na 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dka' ba yod pa ma yin zhing chos don 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha mo'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pa la brtson pa na 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dka' ba yod pa ma yin zhing chos don 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, when one is diligent in the recitation of the essence mantra of the goddess and the quintessence mantra without interruption, there is no difficulty in acting for the welfare of the world, and all desired aims will be accomplished.

original: de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i cho ga'o /
translated: This is the uncommon rite.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu ni //
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu ni //
translated: The yogin should always

original: gang de yi dam du byed na //
analyzed: gang de yi dam du byed na //
translated: make that his commitment.

original: de nas snga dro'i dus dag tu //
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i dus dag tu //
translated: Then, at the time of dawn,

original: chog bzhin du mandala bya //🔽rang 'dod lha yi grangs bzhin du //
analyzed: chog bzhin du mandala bya // rang 'dod lha yi grangs bzhin du //
translated: one should make a maṇḍala according to the rite.🔽One should scatter flowers

original: me tog dag ni dgram par bya //
analyzed: me tog dag ni dgram par bya //
translated: in accordance with the number of one’s desired deities.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
translated: From the seed syllable in one’s heart center,

original: spros la dam tshig sems dpa' gzhug / ye shes sems dpa' de la gzhug / de nas me tog la sogs pa //
analyzed: spros la dam tshig sems dpa' gzhug / ye shes sems dpa' de la gzhug / de nas me tog la sogs pa //
translated: one should emanate the pledge being, and then the wisdom being, and then one should make offerings with flowers and so on,

original: snying po'i sngags dang nye snying sngags //🔽rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags dang nye snying sngags // rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
translated: with the essence mantra, the quintessence mantra,🔽and the eight-line mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad la //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad la //
translated: One should make offerings to all the ḍākinīs and so on,

original: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
translated: One should recite one's own name in the mantra.

original: thog mar aom dang h'um phat mthar //
analyzed: thog mar aom dang h'um phat mthar //
translated: At the beginning, one should add Om, and at the end, Hum and Phat.

original: sbyar ba'i sngags kyis mchod pa bya //
analyzed: sbyar ba'i sngags kyis mchod pa bya //
translated: One should worship with the mantra to which this is added.

original: de ltar bur ni rgyas par bshad //
analyzed: de ltar bur ni rgyas par bshad //
translated: It is explained in this way in detail.

original: phyag rgya chen po la gzhol zhing //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la gzhol zhing //
translated: One who is devoted to the great seal

original: de lha'i lam la zhugs pa dag //
analyzed: de lha'i lam la zhugs pa dag //
translated: and who has entered the path of the deity

original: gol ba'i lam du mi 'gro zhes //
analyzed: gol ba'i lam du mi 'gro zhes //
translated: will not go on a path that is mistaken.

original: bdag gi bla ma de skad gsungs //
analyzed: bdag gi bla ma de skad gsungs //
translated: My guru taught this.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus @184a * //🔽pa rdzogs so /

translated: The brief worship of Vajrayoginī and so forth is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts'a ba mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts'a ba mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
